mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mrs. Washington's Bed Chamber, Where She Died, (May, 1801.) Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Mansion's south lumber room, once believed to have been occupied by Mrs. Washington upon George Washington's death and formally titled 'Mrs. Washington's Bed Room or Chamber.' Later determined that Mrs. Washington resided in a different chamber on the third floor of the Mansion. Mounted on orange board.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
South lumber room
